;;SEO Business Goals for the Year 2011;, ;How To Identify A Scam SEO Company;, ;SEO Business Goals for the Year 2011;
; What is unfortunate, however, is that the world of SEO is not safe from scammers, especially since not a lot of people know enough about it so as to become aware of these kinds of scams. It is crucial for you to remember that not just about all SEO companies are legit, and some of them exist for the reason that intend to prey on unsuspecting victims that may need some help regarding search engine optimization. But due to the sheer number of SEO companies out there, it is difficult to pinpoint the ones that are real, and the ones that are not. Fortunately, there are actually ways wherein we may well identify a scam WEB OPTIMIZATION company.
;
;Scam SEO Companies
;
;One way of identifying if a great SEO company is real or is just a scam is by looking at how they market and also advertise their services. Serious, and successful, SEO companies do not need to employ certain means, including cold-calling or mass-emailing their own abilities, in order to advertise their ability and achievements, which means that people who does, could probably be doing so in order to get you to hire these instead.
;
;If an SEO company is actually genuine, and is effective in its endeavors, potential clients will find a way to know about them and obtain to them without the company having to spread their track record online. Keep in mind that word of mouth can travel fairly easily, and if certain SEO companies will produce satisfying results to their clients, then their performance can eventually spread to other prospective customers.
;
;Also, scam SEO companies can only guarantee you a high rank position browsing engines using unique names, which is an easy thing to do in search engines.
